title: Collateral Umbrella Distribution Instruction File Schema
description: Collateral Umbrella Distribution Instruction File Schema

transactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Clearing member identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

assetNumber.description: Asset number registered in the central depository

securitiesCollateralIdentification.description: Securities collateral identifier given by the requestor participant

securitiesQuantity.description: Quantity requested for securities umbrella type distribution

securitiesAccountIdentificationId.description: Securities account identifier defined by the participant

cashCollateralIdentification.description: Cash collateral identifier given by the requestor participant

cashOperationValueCurrency.description: Currency code for cash operation value
cashOperationValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

cashAccountIdentificationId.description: Cash account identifier defined by the participant

federalBondsCollateralIdentification.description: Federal bonds collateral identifier given by the requestor participant

federalBondsQuantity.description: Quantity requested for federal bonds umbrella type distribution

federalBondsAccountIdentificationId.description: Federal bonds account identifier defined by the participant
